mapper.sql: FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, ASCRIPTION_TYPE, USER, OCCUPATION, ORGANIZATION, FILENAME, FILESIZE, SUFFIX, ISPUBLIC
mapper.insert: insert into file (FILE_PATH, ASCRIPTION_TYPE, USER, OCCUPATION, ORGANIZATION, FILENAME, FILESIZE, SUFFIX, ISPUBLIC) values (#{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ascriptionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{user.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{occupation.occupationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{organization.organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update:
update file
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASCRIPTION_TYPE = #{ascriptionType,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER = #{user.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OCCUPATION = #{occupation.occupationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORGANIZATION = #{organization.organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILESIZE = #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUFFIX = #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISPUBLIC = #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR},
where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update file set FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASCRIPTION_TYPE = #{ascriptionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER = #{user.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OCCUPATION = #{occupation.occupationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORGANIZATION = #{organization.organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE = #{filesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUFFIX = #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISPUBLIC = #{ispublic,jdbcType=CHAR} where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
